level.heading: Forfeiture.
level.text: The award of good time credits for good behavior and faithful performance of duties may be forfeited, withheld, and restored by the Director, in accordance with rules promulgated by the Mayor pursuant to § 24-221.02, after a hearing, which shall be conducted in accordance with the rules.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 6-218
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-218, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-221.01.
